CustomField.description: Check this box if the customer would like to customize our base features (e.g., Startup = 2 environments). Do not check this box if the customer wants to add-on features to a base package (e.g., Startup + A/B testing).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if the customer would like to customize our base features (e.g., Startup = 2 environments). Do not check this box if the customer wants to add-on features to a base package (e.g., Startup + A/B testing).
CustomField.label: Standard base plan?
